hero.title: Software Developer
hero.description_1: I'm a software engineer who enjoys turning ideas into web apps that actually work (and look good doing it). I've spent the last few years building projects with modern stacks like React, TypeScript, and Node.js, always aiming for that sweet spot between clean code and a smooth user experience.
hero.description_2: I like making things that are useful, intuitive, and sometimes just for fun (because why not?). Whether it's a SaaS platform, a mobile app, or a little side project that got out of hand, I love bringing concepts to life and learning something new along the way. Currently exploring backend architecture, system design, and a bit of mobile development too.

project.title: Projects
project.description: Découvrez mes projets récents qui mettent en avant mes compétences en développement frontend.

farmconnect.title: FarmConnect
farmconnect.description: A SaaS platform for sheep farming management, built from scratch. Features include livestock tracking, health monitoring, farm and user management, and RFID chip scanning via a Flutter mobile app. I worked across the stack using NestJS, Prisma, React, and Tailwind, with RESTful APIs and weekly Agile sprints. It's one of the first digital agriculture projects of its kind in Algeria, aiming to modernize livestock management through smart tech.

savvy.title: Savvy – Amazon Price Tracker
savvy.description: A web app that scrapes Amazon product data and sends email alerts when items drop in price or come back in stock. Built with Next.js 14 and CRON jobs, with a clean dashboard, form validation, and user-friendly notifications.

contact.description1: Got an idea, a project, or just something cool to build? I'm all ears.
contact.description2: Whether you're ready to start or just exploring, feel free to reach out. Let's see what we can create together.
